evidence: Golden Krust is a Caribbean restaurant chain with franchise locations. This is an independently owned franchise location.

evidence: Concorde Grill is the hotel restaurant at Renaissance Concourse Atlanta Airport Hotel. The hotel is owned/operated by Columbia Sussex.
reasoning: This is a hotel restaurant, not an independent restaurant group. Columbia Sussex owns the Renaissance Concourse Atlanta Airport Hotel which houses Concorde Grill. While Columbia Sussex operates multiple hotels, hotel restaurants are typically considered part of the hotel operation rather than a restaurant group. No sister restaurant concepts identified.

evidence: Ken Katz's LinkedIn profile states: 'Parent Corporation for Buenos Dias Pupusas, La Bodega.' Owned by husband and wife team Ken and Jeannette Katz, established 2012.
reasoning: Web search found LinkedIn profile for Ken Katz (CFO and co-owner) which explicitly states Kosher Guacamole Corp is the parent corporation for both Buenos Dias Pupusas and La Bodega. Multiple sources (AJC, LinkedIn) confirm the Katz family operates both concepts. La Bodega is relocating to Sylvan Hills as of 2024.

evidence: Owned by husband and wife Michael and Leah Bajalia, started in 2020 from their home kitchen after losing jobs

Michael (Culinary School of America grad, certified sommelier) and Leah (vocal performance major, professional actor/singer) started the vegan bakery in 2020. Sold from home, then farmers markets, then opened brick and mortar at 1133 Huff Road. No mention of sister restaurants or group affiliation. Clear independent operation.

evidence: Chef Deborah VanTrece owns both Twisted Soul Cookhouse & Pours and Oreatha's at The Point through VanTrece Hospitality Group, a family-owned company based in Atlanta
reasoning: Website was blocked from direct access, so used web search to find ownership information. holding_company: None detected (formerly owned The Vortex, sold 2024)
evidence: Owned by Michael and Kristen Benoit since 2008. Michael has 20+ years restaurant experience, opened The Vortex in 1992. Bone Garden Cantina was NOT included when The Vortex was sold to Taco Mac owners in 2024.
reasoning: Web search found detailed ownership. Michael Benoit owned The Vortex Bar & Grill (opened 1992), which was sold in 2024, but Bone Garden Cantina (opened 2008) and Laughing Skull Lounge comedy club were explicitly NOT part of the sale. Now operates Bone Garden independently at 1425 Ellsworth Industrial Blvd. No other current sister restaurants identified.

restaurant_name: Boxcar at Hop City West End
sister_child_restaurants: Hop City Craft Beer & Wine - West End
evidence: Owner Kraig Torres opened Boxcar March 1, 2019 with the Hop City team. Hop City first opened in West Midtown in 2009. The group operates Hop City locations and Barleygarden Kitchen & Craft Bar locations.
reasoning: Web search found extensive information about the Hop City group. Owner Kraig Torres has operated Hop City since 2009 and expanded to multiple concepts including Barleygarden Kitchen and Boxcar. Multiple locations across Atlanta metro, Georgia, and Alabama. This is a clear multi-concept hospitality group.

evidence: Co-owners Titi Demissie and Ash Nega, married couple who launched Desta in July 2006. Operates two Atlanta locations: Briarcliff (2566 Briarcliff Rd) and Westside Village (2250 Marietta Blvd NW).
reasoning: Web search found ownership info and multiple locations. The corporate website lists both locations. Desta Ethiopian Kitchen, Inc. owns the trademarked name. Original location opened 2006 in Williamsburg Village, now has two locations. Clear multi-location operation under single ownership.

evidence: Owner Devon Green also owns Milk and Honey Atlanta and is co-owner of Just Chicken fast-food franchise. Operating entity is DABS Hospitality Consulting Group Inc.

evidence: Group events handled by TQM Hospitality (events@tqmhospitality.com). From the creators of Buena Vida Tapas. Led by Chef Joey Vazquez, created by Bravo's Top Chef alum Whitney Otawka and Executive Chef Juan Hormiga.
reasoning: Website checked via web search. Group dining page lists TQM Hospitality contact. About page mentions 'from the creators of Buena Vida Tapas' indicating same ownership group. Located at The Works, 202 Chattahoochee Row. Clear restaurant group operation with at least two concepts.
